confirmed_facts: HYBE Music Group APAC donated 500 million KRW (â‰ˆ2.66 million HKD) to support victims of the Hong Kong highâ€‘rise apartment fire.
The donation was made through Hope Bridge National Disaster Relief Association and will be used via a Hong Kong nonâ€‘profit organization to aid the families of the deceased.
The donation was announced on 2025â€‘11â€‘28 by HYBE Music Group APAC representatives and supported by its six subâ€‘labels.
